entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -26.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
